name: Retro Dodge, Pixel World
description:
This game was intended to be shared just so I can get the hang of itch.io so it is a bit scuffed. If you want to play, I recommend playing on Scratch. 

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/422592253/

Left and Right arrow keys or A, D keys to move the player.

Dodge the knives, spears and shurikens dropping from the sky.

Collect hearts and survive as long as you can.

ENJOY :)
